content.detailedDescription:
I have noticed this object that looks like a star however it changed its location and brightness. when i used the cam coder zoom it looked like two spherical objects attached. the object looked totally like a star so i did not really care much. it stayed in the east side of the sky. 
however, yesterday the object brightness was changing from very bright for few minutes then the light diminish to almost nothing for few seconds then it gets bright. the object seemed to move while there is no light.
today i believe i saw the same bright object however in a different location in the sky without the change in brightness as yesterday.
content.summary: Star like changing position and brightness.

content.detailedDescription:
As usual for a couple of weeks...

a very bright golden star is visible (east and south) at 1h00 am until the sunrise.

you can find a r���������sum��������� of my visual sightings with spacecrafts :

r���������sum���������

content.summary: Golden eastern star.

content.detailedDescription:
Heres my story:\
i layed i my yard star gazing i saw a helicopter i was just going i circles for like 40 min or 50 at max it was still there white a airplain went over it it went up a little then to the left of sky was to airplain flying together then i saw the light again this time i caught it all on cam all this happened at once every thing was so under stand until the airplains and helicopter started going in circles but the light was going straight on its way
trust me guys this is not as real as it gets it gets realeri posted the video on youtubethe url:

[youtube link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: It was an oval like shape moved slow then fast star like but brighter it went on it way as if nothing saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to walgreens with my wife and my 6 year old son to run an errand for my mother-in-law. as we were walking and chatting, my son was asking me what i thought this thin, whispy cloud looked like. i responded that it looked like a bird to me and i continued to scan the sky. as we crossed the road and passed beside the new northlake police station, i glanced up and saw the formation. i said out loud "what is that?" my wife and son looked up and we saw a group of six sphere like objects in the sky, they were in a loose formation, but were also kind of spinning around each other. we stopped walking and took note of this group of objects as they were traveling about 50-70 feet above the tree tops. my son was very excited about the sighting and exclaimed that they seemed to be illuminated, to which my wife concured. 

we thought it might be a cluster of balloons, but they were traveling against the wind and were illuminated by both the sun and the objects themselves. we watched them as they traveled over the tree's and eventually disappeared behind some tree's and houses. my wife and son were both very excited and we talked about it and compared notes of the sighting. 

i tried to get photos or video, using my cell phone, but by the time i got my camera ready, it was over. i took photos of the area and the trees on our return trip to be used in any comparison.

we are hoping someone else might have seen this extraordinary cluster of objects too!
content.summary: Cluster of six sphere-like objects in a formation.

content.detailedDescription: On the 4th of july, 2010 we had a fireworks display take place at a local park in madison, al.  the fireworks started around 9:00 pm and lasted till about 9:30 pm. my wife and i and a few hundred other local folks were at this fireworks show.  my wife and i had parked our car in a parking lot at one of the local business in madison on the west side of the park. about 9:15 pm two red lights came in from the east at about a 100 to 150 ft in the air, no sound, circled the fireworks display to the north, the two lights maintained a set distance apart of about 50 to 75 feet; no craft was visible.  the red two lights flew between us and the firework shells exploding in the background. as the two red lights turned back toward the east the two lights turned into only one and proceed east and maintained the same altitude.  the lights never changed colors, maintained a bright red color.  the lights which did not flash throughout the event. during the event i commented to others at the parking area that "i would give $20.00 to anyone that could tell me what that was." this whole event from beginning to end lasted at best 120 to 180 seconds.
content.summary: Two red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch at 9;40 pm, approx, on the night of july 25, 2010 when i saw a meteor(?) fall on the northeastern horizon.  it was a flash of white-orange light lasting just a few seconds.  the meteor shower called ``the delta aquarids`` peak on july 29. i believe it m-a-y have been one of them..It fell northwest of southeast indy.  but if this info does n-o-t check out, it was a ufo.  also, there were 2 helicopters flying nearby.  that is typical for this area and time of night. the skies were clear and the full moon was coming up on the southeast horizon; the horizon o-p-p-o-s-i-t-e to the meteor which fell near the northeast horizon.  now, should anyone actually ``recover`` this meteorite, i would like a chunk! but if it was n-o-t a falling meteor,
then i don`t know what it was.  thanks for reading! so long for now!
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: It looked like a meteor, but maybe not.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were coming from seeing inception from the amc theaters in bridgewater, nj

we were talking about dreams and aliens as we made it pass the first intersection of commons way and prince rodgers ave. 

we proceeded onto prince rodgers ave for about one minute when my girlfriend noticed something in the sky. 

she said to me "what is that".  i didn't know what she was looking at so i said, "those are buildings". she said to me "no not those, that thing in the sky right there."  i turned my head for a second and could not believe what i saw.  

as we approached the red light at the intersection of prince rodgers ave and north bridge st. i noticed an object in the sky coming from the somerville, nj area.

this object appeared very low to the ground, i am aware normal aircraft must be approximately 6 miles above the surface to be legally in our airspace.

what was even more peculiar was the object was silent. i am highly aware that planes, helicopters, and blimps produce a specific sound depending on their altitude.

now the image of this object is rather bizarre.  it had a flat bottom portion that consisted of way more than 25 lights. they would flash in a specific random sequence, turn off for a second or two, turn back on and begin flashing again. they were also accompanied by a blue light on the side.  it was very hard to tell the depth and true image of the top portion of the object, but it had one nonetheless.  

for a moment i thought maybe it was a blimp, but the speed of this object exceeded that of a blimp.  as the light turned green, i made a right turn onto north bridge street. however, i was going in the opposite direction because i was low on gas and had to get home so i could not keep up with it. so i pulled over and made a quick stop at the nearest bank. i parked and realized we were directly below the object but it didnt stop, being underneath this thing we just gazed at its lights and their bizarre sequence as it passed overhead. 

eventually it passed behind trees that blocked my sight of it and i lost the object.  me and my girlfriend both sat in shock not knowing what we just saw and realizing not a single person would believe us at all. fear seemed to summon within me for i was afraid of what i saw and could not explain it or why i was able to see it.  

if someone were to approach me on the 23rd and said to me, "do you believe in aliens" i would have said not really, i mean we may not be alone but who really knows. but now, i'm pretty much a firm believer that we are not alone and that they are here with us every day hiding in plain sight. 

also it was quite odd to me that on my way back home to somerville, nj.  i just wanted to keep driving around for a bit so i went down to our main st. and to my confusion there were a lot of cops following each other as if they were trying to find something. i eventually made a right turn onto davenport st. and went home.

for those who do not believe in ufo's, i just want to say one thing. i once was just like you. 

i also want to add - the path of the object, it was coming straight then it slowed down turned alittle bit but turned back on its path. it was like watching someone not be able to make up their mind. it was weird because i know planes and helicopters all make wide turns, these turns were fairly quick.
content.summary: Strangest object i've ever seen in my life.

content.detailedDescription: At 5pm tonight i witnessed an object traveling from west to east in the southern sky at about the same locations as i saw last weekend.  it was either reflecting the sunlight and glimmering as it rotated or it was emitting its own light.  i looked through my sonn's hunting scope and observed the object rotating but could not make out a definite shape. at one point the object stopped for several minutes and then proceeded for a few seconds and disappeared. i called my family and a friend up to my balcony and they also witnessed the object. it has the same characteristics as the last objects we observed from the prior week. no,i do not have psychic abilities like some of the nuts that witness "their sightings" and report it on this site. i am not an unbalanced ufo nut. i know that this thing has no characteristics of any aircraft i have seen and it isn't a balloon of any kind. maybe this is military craft? it is just plain weird what we have witnessed.
content.summary: Observed object  traveling from west to east on same horizontal plane as i witnessed last week.

content.detailedDescription: I was just leaving walmart and i was in the parking lot. i was looking at the stars. a plane. it was moving very slow and was not blinking like a plane. i felt exsided because i never seen a ufo before. it dissapeared.
content.summary: It was a red triangular shape moving in the sky. we chased it and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my home haveing a meeting with a fellow employee my wife and  other friend  went out back so to have some tea to leave some privesy in regards to a fellow employee. after about 20 minits or so my wife frantically called me to come and see something up in the sky.I ran to the window and could not understand what i was seeing.As they kept asking me to or what that was we were seeing with all the background i have in civil and military aircraft experience with in a job related nature.I asked my coworker to come out quickly to see what we were all seeing. as i came out the back garden my wife and frinds were frantically trying to ask me what is that . what i saw was. a flashing orange  and then changeing to a solid red without flashing object about several thousand feet up. the reason i say this it was cloudy and overcast with 2 prominent layers of clouds with about a 1000 feet or so between them. this object to me! seemed about the size  of a vw bettle  in size moveing under the cloud line from about the north north west going south south east. at a speed of 200 mph. or slightly faster. the wind at the time was a light breeze if that at ground level. this object was seen by me when it was about the half way point from horizon to it vanished just befor reaching the orizon into a cloud back south south east from my direction. this object did not make any sound what so ever.And its intensity did not change in brightness the whole time i was watching.Some of the other people in the area in thier back gardens were head talking about this also. so i know it was seen by at least 10 or so more then us 4.Knowing the military aircraft in the area . as i work on the miltary base of raf lakenheath a us air base. this was strange to me as like i said  duration of event and the lack of any sounds and it was below the cloud line well below left out any satilite  or possible space station flyby. this i though needs to be reported and so here it is as fact
content.summary: Orange changing to red every 4 8 secounds, some flicker some not.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday july 11th my son and i were outside looking at the milkyway and venus on the western horizon since it was a new moon and very clear.
at the time stated we observed an extremely bright object moving from north to south at (compared to a regular aircrft) a rpid pace. it started as a bright spot and moved approx 15 to 30 degrees accross the sky from the north to the south. 8/10ths of way through our sighting it became a bright orange then faded to a dark pink color the simply dissappeared, although there was a dark object against the sky for a few seconds.
what struck me as odd was the fact that it was completeley silent, had no type blinking anti-collision lights and the ease and speed which it cut through the sky.
 i was in aviation for 12 years and the military for 4 and have never seen anything even remotely close to what i saw that night and in my opinion it defied anything anything flying today.
content.summary: Bright spot moving n to s changed color then winked out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the door way of my apartment facing west at about 10pm on 7/24/10. i then saw an object moving very quickly across the sky. it had no lights it was flying lower than airplanes or helicopters and made no sound it looked like it was flying along the coast line moving south to north about 1.5 miles away. at first i thought it might be a kite or balloons but when i steped out side to look closer it was flying very straight and very fast. my view was then obstructed because of palm trees in my front yard as i was walking around them i saw the object clearly for a few more seconds. it looked like it had wings pointed downward and a short body. im sorry to say it. it looked like something from startrek.
the object then moved out of my view. it was a clear night with the moon almost full and it was 10pm on saturday someone else must have seen it.
content.summary: Saw a fast moving object flying very low without lights or sound.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were camping at upper oso campground near the santa barbara ranger station in the los padres national forest.  that night, we we had both commented on how bright the moon was, so that had been on our mind.  at approx 2:00am, my girlfriend awoke and noticed that she couldn't see the moon anymore.  while she was taking a few seconds to look for it and realize that the moon had gone out of our view behind a ridge, she also saw an interesting combination of lights in the sky southeastern sky and woke me up to see it also.  there was one larger bright light in the center with two smaller and equal lights on either side and two slightly smaller lights on the top and bottom.  the top and bottom lights were on a skewed axis, so all five lights together looked like an off angle cross (see second image).  all five lights were brighter than any star in the sky.  to each side (horizontally) there were slightly expanding (like cones on each side) rays glowing outward.  the lights appeared static, at least for the 10 or so minutes we looked at it.  we got a few pictures with a decent point-and-shoot digital camera, but it was through our tent mesh.  we had no clue as to what they were, although i did mention to her that in that direction was point mugu and point hueneme.  since it wasn't moving relative to our line of sight, it's possible that it could have been moving away from us, i.E. some type of rocket launch.
content.summary: Three lights in southern californina sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend where driving from hartford to lawrence like about 11:30 or so in the night  my frind was in another car following me so i kind of look to my left in to the sky when i saw all this lights in the sky i think they were like 100 first i was thinking that were airplanes but then i said to my self they can't be flying like that in group then i call my friend to his phone and i ask him do u see all those lights in the sky and he ask me where? i responde to your left see the sky to your left and he said yes yes i see them pull over we pullover we saw this 2 or 3 minutes then they dissapier this event ocured the night of july 24 2010 betwen hartford mi and lawrence
content.summary: A lot of lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: It appeared to be a fireball leaving a trail of sparks several hundred feet long behind it except that it moved up and down changing direction every 3 or 4 seconds definitely not a meteor. the trail would also linger for about 10 seconds. it could also disappear and reapear instantly and was joined by a second similar object before both finally went away. it appeared almost alive like a giant snake made of sparks flying thru the sky. it appeared to be centered around the south east face of green mountain in lakewood. there was a chopper with a search light on in the air around the area about 5-10 minutes after the objects disappeared. my first job was at an airport and i've never seen anything like this before, very unusual.
content.summary: Giant luminous and snaking fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the sighting,i was at home standing on my porch calling my dog. i live far out in the country and there is no real ambiant light.  although there was a half-moon it was quite dark as it was covered by a thick cloud cover. while waiting for my dog i looked up to admire the stars.  at this time i noticed a bright disc or circular object at a very high altitude and at a high rate of speed traveling in a south to north direction.  

at first i thought it was just a plane but as i watched i began to realize that it was very high up and moving at a much faster rate of speed than i have observed conventional or military aircraft at various altitudes.  my second thought was that it could be a satelite.  i discounted this as it didn't seem to be that high and i didn't think a satelite would be moving that fast if in orbit.  i further dismissed a meteor as it left no vapor or fire trail as it mantained a constant level flight. the brightness of the object's light was also constant.  there were no flashing lights, strobes or anything of that nature.  after a couple of minutes it disappeared behind a bank of clouds and did not re-appear.

i hesitated reporting this sighting as i am not given to thinking that every light in the sky is a ufo but i could come to no other logical conclusion.  i'm a retired military veteran with 34 years of combined service and have flown in many types of aircraft all over the world and am familar with most all military aircraft.
content.summary: Bright circular object  at high speed and high altitude going south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the clarissa falls open air restaurant and this thing caught my eye as i was watching birds. it was spherical, but divided into hemispheres by a slight ridge and also each hemisphere was divided into quadrants. it flew at an altitude of maybe 1 to 2 thousand feet and disappeared behind trees faster than i could run to snap a shot. it flew east to west, horizontally. the kitchen girls got kind of excited seeing me run. it had a mirror like surface. at first i thought weather balloon, but today i decided to look at photos of weather balloons and can't find anything near what i saw. i estimate that it was 15 to 20 feet in diameter.
content.summary: Sphere of mirror material.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out on my back patio after having a psychic experience. something told me i would see the craft with the being i had just been in contact with telepathically. sure enough there was a high flying bright object moving at a very high rate of speed. given the altitude and speed the craft had to have very, very large, perhaps a mile wide or more.

telepathic communication is new to me. i started being contacted several weeks ago by the one we used to call jesus (that was never his real name). he has changed his name to sananda, he is the one called the warrior king from ancient cultures, aka archangel michael represented by the planet mars in ancient mythology.

these beings downloaded into my awareness the proper way to model how ions are made from the vacuum of space. i have been writing physics papers these last few weeks. before i began receiving these downloads i was a nurse administrator. now i have been retained to write a paper to explain some issues bothering nasa since 2008. i am now a paid theoretical physicist though i have no background in physics. 

i attended the natural philosophy alliance last month and spoke with many presenters there. i was able to teach them many things they had not considered though they were on the right track with aether physics. one of them, john milewski phd wants to make me a partner in his firm that applies his own model for magnetic light to gold extraction. i explained to him the physics of alchemy, anti-gravity and zero point free energy (zero spark or moving parts and zero input needed). john knew enough to know the physics i showed him are for real so now i have a new career.

the point of telling you this is that we are being upgraded as a species. we passed the tests and hardships of duality and will rejoin our genetic families from many other worlds very soon.

i'm sorry i do not have a camera other than my iphone, it could not make out the craft against the bright moon light it was speeding towards last night. i thought you should know that many orbs are being spotted around sacramento valley these days in broad daylight. just type sacramento orbs or roseville, loomis rocklin orbs, its getting very busy around here these days.

be in love and peace. the good guys rule the space we are entering
content.summary: High and fast moving craft, very bright.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:00pm i was taking my cousin mike home.  we left my house at exactly 11:00pm.  as we passed by a field near my house, i always look up and see if anything is up there.  never, until june 9th was there.  as i looked in the sky i saw 3 helicopters in a triangular formation more of an obtuse formation, if i'm using that term correctly, one helicopter was farther away than a normal triangle.  at any rate, i slowed down to get a look at them, seemingly strange they were just sitting there as we have no airports around this area that i am aware.  the nearest airport i know of is in south lakeland, some 20 miles away. realizing something may be up, i noted the time as 11:02pm.  i made a u-turn on a nearby street and as i came back to the stop sign to turn back right to see them again, i looked across the street and in the sky was the brightest "star" i'd ever seen! i noted it's position as being directly across of the field in which i observed the 3 helicopters.  as i returned to the field at exactly 11:03 in which i saw these 3 helicopters they were nowhere to be seen or heard.  i know this because no traffic was in the area that late at night.  i got out of my truck which i had turned off and listened keenly for the "chop" of the helicopter.  i did not hear it.   these mysterious helicopters were simply gone, and not heard.  out here in this area you can hear tires screeching on interstate 4 which is some 4 miles away.  i should have heard something.  leaving the scene at the field disappointed i headed back south to take my cousin home.  i traveled west on marcum road and looked for the "star" but did not see it, the time then was 11:18pm.  i looked farther away and saw a red in color "orb" or "sphere" which was far away enough to be over the gulf of mexico but very high in the sky.  the gulf of mexico from here is approximately 60 miles.  that is the last i saw of anything.  excitement was a feeling i got from seeing everything happen that night.  another feeling i got was strange, it hit me hard too, the feeling was as if i were in a "crossfire" of sorts.  the thought i had was these 3 helicopters were defending air space from this brilliant blue object.  i am a believer. i called it an "otherworldly standoff".
content.summary: Ufo was starlike in appearance and very brilliant bright blue in color.

content.detailedDescription:
The event took place during the summer of 1985 (july) and was reported in our local news paper (the lorain journal). i will never forget what happened that night for the rest of my life (my mother still has the article.)

it was the last summer that i lived in lorain, ohio prior to joining  the u.S navy that (october 23rd) and going to great lakes for basic training.

earlier that summer (june 1985) i had graduated from southview high scool and took a security job with valley security @ (ford motor co.) just to keep a few dollars in my pocket for the summer, until i went into the navy.

my older brother who had been working at valley security for a couple years got me the job. my brother {who i will call van for this record} was sgt. of the watch from (2400 - 0800).

during that summer the truckers (e&l trucking) were on strike ... that's who transported the vehicles once they came off the assembly line (lorain ford motor plant.)

the parking lot was full at the plant because of the strike, so they started taking the new vehicles to an empty lot down the road about two miles away. that's where the event took place.

i worked from 2400-0600 at that lot which was directly across the street from lake erie. the night started just like any other night before, where i got there at (11:45 pm) sharp! i spoke with the officer who i was to relieve, at which time he gave me the radio (walkie-talkie) and the clip board and then left. 

i contacted headquaters (hq) at the plant (ford assy plant) and spoke with my brother van who was the sgt of the watch that night, and let him know that i was at my post and all was secure. 

just a little side note: this lot was about half the size of a football field and had been empty space before they started parking the overflow of vehicles coming off the line. my job was to drive there and park and every hour on the hour walk the property to make sure that the vechicles were secure and then report to hq.

on this particular night i had been at my post for about 30 minutes which makes the time 0015. i had relieved the watch and reported to hq that all is well. 

as i sat there in my mothers car facing lake erie, i noticed some glowing lights going straight-up out of the water slowly into the air. my first thought was that maybe some boater's were launching some sort of distress signal or fireworks. it was kinda weird because most flares or fireworks move faster than that. to be honest that is what really caught my attention!

i got out of the car and walked to the front of the vehicle and leaned on it. as i was doing that these glowing lights continued to go straight-up in the air "slowly" and then stopped for a couple of seconds. now i'm thinking what the heck is this.

the objects began to move "slowly" forward, coming directly towards me. in other words it's flight path would look like an upside down "l" shape.
as the objects got closer i noticed a couple things:

* there was a cluster of them (5 or 6) moving in perfect sync like the navy's blue angels only much much slower.

* there was absolutley no sound or exhaust coming from them.

* they were perfectly round orbs or spherical in nature.

* there was no marking's of any kind nor was there any port/starboard lights as seen on military or commercial aircraft.

* they were about the lenght of a car. (only round)

* they were pulsating in differnt colors (but no sound). 

* they were close enough where i could hit them easily with a stone.

continuing ... as they moved towards me, i turned on my brothers police issued flashlight that he would let me use when i worked at this location (field) it was very dark and there were no street lights in that area.

anyway that's how i knew there were no markings or numbers on these objects and the flashlight did not cast a reflection.

they came to a complete stop directly over me for about 30 seconds, that's when i thought about picking up a rock and throwing at them. i didn't because it would have been awkward to throw at something straight-up in the air. (however they were close enough for me to do it with ease.)

the next thing i knew in a flash or the blink on an eye they were gone!
so i called down to hq (walkie-talkie) and reported what i just saw, and made notes in my report.

minutes later the night sky was buzzing with fighter jets f-15 that i assume were scrambled from wright patterson air force base located in dayton,ohio.

 when i got off that morning (0600) i was called to hq to give a  full report of what happened to the capt.

to be honest i don't think anyone believed what i saw, so when i got home that morning my mother had made breakfast for van and i at which time i told her every detail of what happened, and i even drew her a picture.

after breakfast i went to bed for several hours because i had to be back at work later that night again from 2400-0600 in the same field/post.

when i woke up for dinner that evening my mother had the local news paper (lorain journal) waiting for me at the table. on the front page was a picture of what i drew for her and several witness's testimonies.

not only did i see these things but a doctor, lawyer, police officer, nurse, fireman and a few others. the only differnce between them and myself is that they saw these things from a distance, where as i saw them up close and personal. 

after i got out of the military i moved to atlanta,ga (south of the city) and on a few occasions have seen these things again. only not in a cluster (group) but one at a time, and i have contacted the faa (hampton center) that is near my home about this.

 one of my close friends is a supervisor (air traffic controler) at the hampton center but was off the night i called in to report the object.

thank you!

sincerely,
*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Group of glowing balls.

content.detailedDescription: I was on our back deck at approx 10 pm and off too my left i observed a colorfull object slowly come into veiw over some trees. it was triangular in shpe with a whie light in the front and one on each rear corner for a total  of three. various colors took up the center of the craft. the craft was going very slow with no sound.My wife witnessed the object as well as it slowly floated over us.She run for the camera but by the time she returned the craftpicked up speed and went into a bank of clouds.All we were sure of is this object was quite low however i would only be guessing at it's dimensions as it was against a dark cloudy sky.We arn't sure what we saw but we know what it wasn't. any feedback would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Colorfull object in the shape of a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a "follow-up" report to my july 18th report.

light #1:
has changed its nightly course a bit, and tonight, i was in amazement of something it did. i admit i had my camera outside with me, but forgot my tripod. i use it when i record so that the camera is steady - it is easier to see the object move when the camera is not moving- i like doing my light videos that way... but anyways, i forgot the tripod and could kick myself for it right now... i am still blown away by this...
well i was watching the light while outside, i usually do this every night - but i noticed tonight that its path was a little off of what it usually is... so while watching it - i saw an approaching airplane that was headed right towards it, i watched, totally stunned, totally forgetting my freaking camera was in my hand!!! well as i was watching this airplane getting closer, it moved, the light moved! it moved up quickly and stopped, it moved out of the way of the airplane... the airplane did not change its course it still kept going straight and it flew right under it... after it passed, the light moved back to where it was and proceeded along its route --- i am still ... wow... the airplane flew under it!!! it moved out of the airplanes way! i am amazed. i am so mad at myself for not getting that, i came in and told my boyfriend and he just shook his head at me and was reminding me i did have my camera out there with me... i felt like such an ass!!!!!!!!!!!!! i watched the light till i couldn't anymore and as it was almost out of my site it changed in color to a firey orange. it is usually all white with some mild flicker of color, but it does it so it blends with the white.

light #2:
also seemed different tonight, its not as bright as it usually is, and is moving a little more sporadically, in circles, small circles. i tried to video it but of course my camera only has a 3x zoom, which is crap for this stuff...

other lights:
i have still been seeing them, just not as many.

new light a:
there was a new light out there tonight, it flew parrallel with a few airplanes, for only a few feet and then would stop. it seemed like it was pretty close to them too.

new light b:
i saw another new one tonight, it was as bright as lights 1 & 2, and this one dimmed and almost dissapeared when an airplane got near it. i could still see it, just not as good, i lost it after the plane when by it.





i filed out one of these reports already, i am interested in someone coming out so i can point out what i am seeing, so it can be investigated. i was contacted by a mufon rep. via email, i replied several times asking him to call me and have not received a phone call. so i would still like a phone call. 

i have spotted so many of the things that are like lights 1&2 and am interested in posibly being able to find out what they are.

years ago, i saw one out back in the sky in glen burnie. i got in my car to see if i could find it. i did, it was hoving above the power plant on ft smallwood rd.

so please i want someone from mufon to come and investigate, i just want to stay anonymous.
content.summary: Light in the sky moved for airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the garbage out to our apartments dumpster.  looked up in the sky over the fence line and saw a bright light in the sky, it was circular and moving in my direction. it was moving really slowly, no sounds, or anything coming from it. it was about 500 yards away and about 500 or so feet in the air, when i heard a helicopter coming from the opposite direction. the circular craft, stopped moving in my direction and went off at an angle and was gone in about 10 seconds. the helicopter was just passing over our apartments when the ufo was no longer visable. the helicopter turned in the direction the ufo was going in.
content.summary: Ufo then military helicopter going in direction of ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos de vacaciones en la habana cuba cuando fotografiabamos para el recuerdo, en eso fotografiamos hacia el cielo solo para captar con la camara un edificio con una antena al fondo, se hicieron varias tomas consecuentes (envie una foto antes y una despues del avistamiento. fue hasta tiempo despues que vi en la foto dsc03246 que en la partesuperior derecha aparecen 3 luces y considero que es un caso para investigar. envio estas fotos a ustedes que se dedican a esto y espero que les ayude en sus investigaciones. ahora se preguntaran porque si el avistamiento fue en el 2005 y hasya ahora les envio las fotos,pues resulta que el motivo es que estaba viendo un programa en discovery chanel de su institucion (mufon) que se encargan de esta investigacion y quice compartir este suceso.
bueno es todo, espero que sea de beneficio esta informacion. cualquier informacion adicional que necesiten con todo gusto les puedo ayudar,les dejo mi correo electronico: 
saludos cordiales, 
*(wit's name and email address deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Avistamiento puntos 3 luminosos en cielo (habana cuba)

content.detailedDescription: I had pick my son from school at about 3:05. on the way home we came to a stop sign at a high  ridge. i looked to the right, thats when i seen it just over the trees line. i could not beleave it, but it was so big so clear. i ask my son do you see that. he said yes!!!!  the craft was 1500ft away and only 50ft over the tree tops. the craft was a disk shape but on each end was like a ball. it had to 350 to 400 feet long. it was in the drection of my house and shops. i did not want to move as it was just hoovering over the trees. under the craft the air looked like the air over a road on a hot summer day. after about 2 mins. i had to try to get closer. i turn right and speed after it. as i drove down the hill i lost sight it and when we got to where it was it was gone. i drove around and back to were we seen it but was just gone.
content.summary: My son and i seen a ufo on the way from school.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on the deck of our beach house at sunset beach, nc, overlooking the atlantic ocean facing due south.  about 9:30 pm as we were talking, one of our family members (there were four of us that witnessed this) said "what is that?"  i looked to the sky and there were two orange/yellow lights in the sky above the ocean directly out from our deck...They seemed to be fairly close to together (more apart than two headlights coming toward you), and were fairly bright, like a street light from about a 100 yards away.  there was a pretty bright moon out over the ocean, and they were just under the moon, so they were pretty high up (unless they were much closer to shore than we thought,  but definitely not on the water).  after about two seconds, the left-most light turned off, then three or four more lights to the right all came on.  they were on for another 3-5 seconds, then all of them went dark.

there was no sound of any engines in the air.  all of the lights were in a parallel line with the horizon.  during the time the lights were on, they didn't move at all.  we first thought fireworks, as when it reaches it zenith, and right before it explodes,  but these lights couldn't have been fireworks as they floated still for several seconds and were in such perfect parallel order.  

we did notice a lot more airplane activity over the ocean after this incident, but it may have been because we were looking for it.  perhaps something with the military was our first guess.

about 50 minutes later, we did notice two more similar lights in the distance come on, but there was some clouds and it wasn't as clear.  they seemed further away as well.  

based on the angle, we could also discount boats, as they were much higher in the air.

we had several feelings after seeing them, trying to determine what we saw.  it was as if it was a line of silent helicopters hovering over the ocean and they turned their lights on for a few seconds, then turned off, like they had to mark something.  but with the moonlight providing some light in the evening sky, we couldn't see the shapes of anything once the lights went off.  it was like whatever generated the lights simply vanished with no sound.

i'd love to hear likely things that we witnessed.
content.summary: Sets of paralell orange/yellow "orbs"...Two on, one off, four on...1/2 mile high, stationary.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went outside to see if we could catch any more of these strange lights that we have been seeing since january and sure enough as soon as we went outside we saw a bright amber colored light about 2000 feet above our house heading from the north west toward the south east from the region where the constelation sagitarius is located. it was 2155 at night and the skies were clear. i told my wife to run inside and get my flip video camera and i recorded its path. to the naked eye it was pulsated a bright amber light, but through my camcorder it was pulsated red, green, blue, and white. it lasted for 12 min and 58. and there were a two air planes in the area heading north east a little lower than the object around 2208. my wife took a couple of pictures of it and when you zoom in on the picture it looks realy interesting. a small patch of clouds came out of nowhere heading south west and covered the object after they cleared out 5 min later the object was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and my wife saw an amber light slowly flying over the house and we got a picture and video of it.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly before sunset that evening i was picking up my son from his friends house when i noticed a orange sphere moving slowly acouple hundred feet over the trees.I slowed down to observe what i thought was a helicopter moving south.Since there is a marine logistics base near us my first thought was it was military,but i quickly saw that it wasn't.It was absolutly silent and had no real shape to it or outline of an aircraft. i got out of my car and watched it slowly maneuver south/southeast,i got back in and continued on to pick up my son.On the way back[not even 5 minutes later] it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slowly moving over tree tops.

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting into my car after leaving work from a small woodshop in the industrial park located on county road d in phillips, wi.  upon walking out to the gravel parking lot toward my vehicle, i notice a bright light in the sky at aircraft level traveling from north to south.  i assumed (due to the single light) that it was probably a helicopter.  upon entering my vehicle and facing it south towards the parking lot exit, i notice that the light changed direction and was now traveling from east to west in the direction i was turning.  upon reaching the intersection between d and highway 13 a quarter mile down the road, i noticed the light was no longer paralleling the road and did not think anything of it.
i would not see the light again for several minutes.  upon taking a right turn to head south on thirteen, and a subsequent left onto county road f at the corner by harbor view supper club and proceeding another half mile the light reappeared.  it seemed to be paralleling my path down the road and wavering back and forth slightly as it moved.  i convinced myself it was an optical illusion created my staring at a distant star from a moving vehicle.  however, when i reached the bend in the road just before county road f intersects with county road s i was proven wrong.  the disk shot over the treetops as soon as i hit the corner and appeared to stop above the treetops in the middle of the field which is owned now by a local tree farmer.  as i turned onto s and proceeded home and approached the middle of the field the object seem to lower its altitude.  as i drew near, it suddenly moved across the field and blocked my path in the road.  the object appeared oval shaped and backlit.  (much like when someone holds a flashlight directly in your eyes so that you cannot see them)  it was large enough that it stretched from one end of the road to the other.  i immediately stopped my vehicle and put the car in park.  the object was approximately 20 feet above the ground at this point.  my window was rolled down and my radio was not on.  i remember thinking about how crazy it was that i could hear the hum of my car and crickets chirping in the ditch, but no sound came from this object.
after approximately thirty or so seconds (it seemed longer but could not have been) the object lowered to about the height of the roof of my car and began to approach my vehicle.  i felt the hair rise on the back of my neck in a manner which i would compare to that of an excited dog.  i assumed at the time it was out of fear, but now also remember somewhat of a heat or electricity in the air.  at this point i placed my vehicle in reverse, performed a quick y turn, and sped away from the object.  i could see its reflection in my rear view mirror until i was back on county road f and heading back to town.  i sped back to town, stopped at what is now a bp gas station, and phone my parents to let them know about the event.  they advised me that i had to get home somehow and may as well come back.  that made sense lol.  
when i eventually returned to the field the object was sitting again at treetop level in the far corner of the field.  it appeared to have changed in color from a bright white light to a more vanilla color.  i again stopped my vehicle at the midpoint of the field, and it again moved to block the roadway.  it maintained a height of approximately 40 feet from the ground.  i observed the object for approximately a minute and a half.  at this point another vehicle turned up county s behind me.  as soon as the other vehicle came into sight, the object moved from a dead stop to a speed i could barley follow heading directly north and was suddenly gone.  that is the end of my experience.

there was no missing time or anything else odd about the occurrence apart from the obvious.  

i wish i worked for the government concerning this topic.  it has held my curiosity strongly since.  i do believe that these are either government vehicles or legitimate intelligently controlled vehicles not originating on earth.  i could understand in either instance the government���s desire to keep this out of sight.  the et explanation would do well to hide important aerospace technology.  if i were under government employ regardless of the case, i would certainly keep this intelligence a secret in the course of serving my country.  (i believe the govt. does most things with good reason)
content.summary: Followed home and confronted by large egg shaped glowing light.

content.detailedDescription:
Reported to me by my cousin:
location: viewing location was on rt. 11 approximately near i-81, exit 213 just south of greenville, va.  approximate coordinate location of his point of view:  37������58' n  79������10'  w

object:  at approximately 3:30 am on july 18, 2010 my cousin reported viewing ,northwest of the above location, a set of four lights, brighter than stars and moving in an isolated area of the sky approximately 10������ off the horizon.  surrounding the four primary lights were 2-4 secondary lights which appeared to circle around the primary lights (think electrons around an atom's nucleus).  the lights did not follow the background stars (i.E. rotation of the earth throughout the sighting).  the lights moved in opposing directions and seemed to emit a bright searchlight-like beam from time to time.  the only city in the direction of where the lights were seen is waynesboro, va which is approximately fifteen miles away.  no major airports or low-level air traffic normal.  a few small airports are in the vicinity however the object(s) did not act anything like either fixed-wing or rotor wing aircraft of any known type.

personal observation:  my cousin had just got home from work at the time of the sighting and was not intoxicated, nor was he tired (the reason he was outside was because he couldn't get to sleep).  he is not the type of person to overreact or dramatize situations of any type.  he called me because he knew that i would take him seriously.  he also reported the object to his girlfriend who was sleeping at the time.  upon doing so, she told him that she was aware of the object, and had seen it before.  my cousin also reported feeling a very odd empty feeling at not being able to logically categorize what he was seeing.  since others are aware of this object i surmise that i should have a good chance of viewing it this weekend.
content.summary: Series of four primary lights, equidistant from each other, moving through sky as a unit with 2-4 secondary lights circling around the primary lights.  spotlight-like projections also present.
